title: Other regions
body: I am currently in the US Navy, stationed in Japan. I would like to get the optimal experience / fps by playing on Japanese servers, but i obviously cant read Japanese, is there any way i can play on the Japanese servers in English? Please answer ASAP, thank you very much.

replies.body: You'd definitely have better ping playing in that region!  Currently, each region has their own set of [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  The Japan region only supports Japanese and cannot be modified.  You can certainly play on there, but it won't be possible to swap it to English.  Let me know if you have any questions!
